## Shiny App
1. Every Company will give Salary based on the Number of months worked.
2. This App also works the same way as all other companies did.
3. Shiny is a best and a very Simple way to create the Apps along with Styles.

## Advantages
1. Its a Simple and Understandable to everyone.
2. There's no kind of complexity in App.
3. Basic functions of R are used and Simple Way of Salary Calculation.

## About The App
1. I used very Basics of R code.
2. Functions like numericInput which takes the input from the user in the SidebarPanel.
3. The input is displayed again in the mainPanel. 
4. I used a Submitbutton.

## Explanation About App
1. In This App Employees Salary is Calculated by using number of months worked.
2. Employee should Enter the number of months worked.
3. Salary for Each employee is Fixed and based on that Salary is Calculated.
